entry.title: Saturday night: Chance of rain showers or flurries. Low minus 7. POP 30%
entry.summary: Partly cloudy. 30 percent chance of rain showers or flurries early this evening. 30 percent chance of flurries before morning. Wind up to 15 km/h. Low minus 7. Wind chill minus 12 overnight. Forecast issued 4:00 PM MST Saturday 1 April 2023

entry.title: Sunday: Chance of flurries. High plus 3. POP 30%
entry.summary: A mix of sun and cloud. 30 percent chance of flurries early in the morning. Wind becoming southwest 20 km/h in the afternoon. High plus 3. Wind chill minus 12 in the morning. UV index 3 or moderate. Forecast issued 4:00 PM MST Saturday 1 April 2023
